headline.main: STUDENTS VEER FROM ISOLATION; Or. Hopkins of Dartmouth Sees College Group 'Way Ahead of Public Opinion' on War

lead_paragraph: Current student opinion on the war, as represented by the attitude of Dartmouth College students, is "way ahead of public opinion" as the result of a rapid shift from isolationism in the last two years, Dr. Ernest Martin Hopkins, president of Dartmouth, declared yesterday.
abstract: N Y Alumni Assn dinner honors Dr E M Hopkins; illus; Hopkins int
